subject: Vam units
description_text:
Hi can I order the new brackets for the vam unite please

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text:
Is anyone able to reply to me please. I have tried checking the ticket but it's says I need to be logged in?

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Hi James hare,    Please provide the order date, order amount, and contact information so that I can help you check the order number. Normally, we ship orders in the sequence they are placed. Due to the Black Friday season, there may be some delay in shipping, but please rest assured that we will arrange your shipment as soon as possible.

Hi
I purchased some second hand pro x ultra pedals from someone I know so I do not have an order number. I have the blue vam linear units I would just like the newer horizontal mounts you sell. If you can't do them I will just buy some off Etsy

Thank you

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Hi James hare,     These are the lateral motor mounting brackets for the throttle and brake. Please note that both brackets need to be ordered separately.Â   https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-haptic-reactor-mounting-brackets?variant=52116213727546     https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-haptic-reactor-mounting-brackets?variant=52116213760314

Thank you. Is the pro x ultra upgrade kit the same stuff that the pro x ultra pedals come with from factory?

https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-pro-x-ultra-pedals-upgrade-kit

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi James hare,    They are the same.
